name: The Watched
description:
Collect clues to maintain your sanity and vanquish the ancient evil haunting the town.

Controls

WASD: Move

F: Interact

E: Consume clue to restore sanity

B: Open inventory

Made by Matt McGill and Ryan Pearce for Low Rez Jam 2016

Music by Mark Sparling - http://marksparling.com/

Using sounds from:

  • klankbeeld, NoiseCollector and LittleRobotSoundFactory via freesound.org
  • sonniss.com
  • dustyroom.com
